repository.corpname: The New York Public Library. Carl H. Pforzheimer Collection of Shelley and His Circle.

address.addressline: Fifth Avenue at 42nd Street, New York, NY 10018-2788

did.abstract: Alan Alexander Milne, English writer. To Mr. Wilson : 1 autograph letter signed : 25 Aug 1929 : (MISC 0918a) : from 13, Mallord Street, Chelsea, S.W.3. (printed stationery) : begins, "I am sending you a little book, just published in this form, in token of my admiration for the work you are doing, and in grateful recognition of the way in which the Authors Pension Fund has profited by it ...".

scopecontent.p: To Mr. Wilson : 1 autograph letter signed : 25 Aug 1929 : (MISC 0918a) : from 13, Mallord Street, Chelsea, S.W.3. (printed stationery) : begins, "I am sending you a little book, just published in this form, in token of my admiration for the work you are doing, and in grateful recognition of the way in which the Authors Pension Fund has profited by it ...".

prefercite.p: A. A. Milne manuscript material : 1 item, Carl H. Pforzheimer Collection of Shelley and His Circle, The New York Public Library
